question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. "give way" sign
B. "watch for cyclist" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "give way" sign is visibly larger and positioned lower in the frame, indicating it is closer to the camera than the "watch for cyclist" sign, which appears smaller and further back.
